settings.hero-main-richtext: Discover Uniquely Crafted Bouquets and Gifts for Any Occasion: Spread Joy with Our Online Flower Delivery Service
settings.hero__description: Experience the joy of giving with our modern floral studio. Order online and send fresh flowers, plants and gifts today.
settings.hero: flex-wrap lg:flex-nowrap lg:flex w-full justify-between items-start lg:hide-scrollbar
settings.hero__left-col: w-full lg:w-1/2 px-4 py-10 md:p-20 lg:border-b-[1px] lg:border-brand-black lg:sticky lg:top-0 lg:h-full lg:aspect-square

settings.tail-hero__description: w-1/2 pl-4 content-end text-mobile-small-description md:pl-6 md:text-desktop-caption

settings.subheading_text: schedule an appointment with us now

settings.heading: text-mobile-heading-2 md:text-desktop-heading-2 font-semibold

settings.review_text: Ordered flowers online and they were the best bouquet! Impressed everyone around. Highly recommend this flower shop!
Flower subscriptions revolutionized my Kiev hotel! Conveniently customize and receive fresh bouquets regularly. Highly recommended for hassle-free floral arrangements!

settings.tw_reviews_section: flex flex-col justify-center items-center text-center px-[46px] py-10 md:p-20
settings.tw_section_heading: mt-6 lg:mt-[1.7vw] font-semibold text-mobile-heading-2 md:text-desktop-heading-2 lg:text-[3.8vw]

settings.tw_section_button: mt-16 px-6 py-4 uppercase w-full md:w-auto border border-brand-black
